cursor.description: A pagination cursor that represents a position in the dataset. If given, results will be returned from the item after the cursor. If not given, results will be returned from the beginning.
cursor.name: cursor

filter.description:
Filter the products based on attributes, e.g., `deliveryMethod eq "SAAS"`. The supported operators are:
- `PR` (present; `name pr`)
- `EQ` (equal)
- `NE` (not equal)
- `CO` (contains; `text co "searching"`)
- `SW` (starts with)
- `EW` (ends with)
- `GT` (greater than)
- `LT` (less than)
- `GE` (greater than or equal)
- `LE` (less than or equal).

These expressions can be logically linked with `AND` and `OR`. All attributes (and the special `text` attribute) can be used as filters, if the attribute type allows the operator.
filter.name: filter

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return in the response. If maximum is exceeded, maximum is used.
limit.name: limit

offset.description: The offset of the first item in the collection to return.
offset.name: offset

sort.description: Sort the products based on attributes and order e.g. `name:asc`. Attributes with scalar types (`createdAt`, `isProductListing`) or keywords (`name`, `deliveryMethod`, `lifecycleState`, `vendor.name`) can be used as sort criteria. To set the sort order, append `asc` (ascending) or `desc` (descending) to the attribute, e.g. `name:asc`. To sort by multiple attributes, separate them with a comma. E.g `name:asc,price:desc`.
sort.name: sort

value.message: Access to this resource is forbidden.
Access to this resource requires authentication.

instanceTarget.description: The target URL of the user instance, used to redirect the user to the instance after the subscription is active.

demoUrl.description: The URL to a demo if available.

hasDemo.description: If the product has a demoUrl available.

hasPrivatePlanOption.description: If the product has a private plan option.

isProductListing.description:
If true, the product is not fully integrated but only listed. Product listings may not have prices and support information.

Deprecated: Will be removed after 16.12.2025. Please use `offerType` as replacement.

vendorTerms.description: The list of terms of use.

count.description: The number of items associated with this facet value.

CatalogProductFacets.description: A collection of facets, where each key represents a facet category.

summary.description: The short summary of the product.

error.description: Reason phrase of the status code.

timeStamp.description: Timestamp at which the error occurred.

assets.description: The assets associated with the product.

assetsEndUserLicenseAgreement.description: The related end user license agreement of the (subscription) product.
assetsEndUserLicenseAgreement.title: endUserLicenseAgreement

assetsProductDescription.description: The related product description of the (subscription) product.
assetsProductDescription.title: productDescription

assetsServiceLevelAgreement.description: The related service level agreement of the (subscription) product.
assetsServiceLevelAgreement.title: serviceLevelAgreement

catalogHighlightContent.example: this is the content of the best highlight ever

contactPersonName.description: The full name of the contact person.

cursor.description: A pagination cursor that represents a position in the dataset. If given, results will be returned from the item after the cursor. If not given, results will be returned from the beginning.

customerToken.description: Opaque token exchangeable for subscription details.

deliveryMethod.description: The product delivery method/type. For reference: SAAS - Software as a Service, SAI - STACKIT Application Image

fileName.description: The file version matching the file name (localized).

freeTrial.description: The amount of days of free trial highlighted in the product card.

localizedVersion.description: The localized version (file name) of a file.

noticePeriod.description: The notice period for a product and plan.

value.description: The value of the corresponding type. Omitted for _SAME_DAY_.

offerType.description: The offer type of a product reflecting the business model.

planId.description: The user-readable plan ID of a pricing option.

pricingOptionRate.description: The price of the product (per unit).

pricingOptionUnit.description: The interval to which the rate applies.

productCategories.description: The list of categories associated to the product.

productIndustries.description: The list of industries associated to the product.

productLifecycleState.description: The lifecycle state of the product.

productSummary.description: The short summary of the product.

serviceCertificate.description: The related service certificate of the (subscription) product.
serviceCertificate.title: serviceCertificate

sku.description: The concrete variant of the product.

skuInfoDetails.description: More details about what this offering entails.
skuInfoDetails.example: Access the full suite of the Product features with this plan.

supportPhone.description: The phone number for support inquiries.

tosDescription.example: See the terms and conditions of this product.

post.description: Create an inquiry to contact sales, become a vendor, request a private plan, register for testing, or suggest a product. Requests are limited to 10 per 5 minutes.
Get details about the requested subscription.

get.description: List all subscriptions of a project.
get.summary: List all subscriptions of a project.

post.description: Reject a subscription (in any lifecycle state). Only available for subscriptions to products with lifecycle state `PRODUCT_PREVIEW`.
